name: Osprey Jet 12 Pack - Children
description:
Outdoor independence starts here. This daypack has a large clamshell zipper so packing and unpacking isn't a challenge for your young trailster. With 2 rows of daisy chain webbing, it's easy to clip on a water bottle. And there's loads of stretchy pockets for tucking away small items. At 12 liters, it's just the right size for a spare layer and some snacks.Lightweight 400-denier recycled nylon fabric is treated with DWR for water resistance.Mesh-covered EVA foam harness is comfortable, lightweight and moisture wicking.External sleeve holds a 1.5L hydration bladder (sold separately).Soft edged shoulder straps have an adjustable sternum strap with safety whistle.External zippered accessory pocket on top.2 side stretch mesh pockets hold water bottles.1 large stretch mesh fits a rain jacket.Suggested age: 4-12.

        Sustainability
